test_case.title: Opening Keynote App from Spotlight Search
pre_condition: The user has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) with an operational Spotlight Search.

steps.expected_result: Spotlight Search opens in the middle of the screen.

steps.action: Enter the letter 'k' in the search field.
steps.expected_result: The letter 'k' is entered into the search field.

steps.action: Verify the appearance of the text "keynote.app - Open" as a suggestion.
steps.expected_result: The text "keynote.app - Open" appears as a suggestion.

steps.action: Press the 'Enter' key on the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: A pop-up window for the Keynote app opens on the screen.
